entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Orillia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:16 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 03:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: 1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: WSW 20 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 8:33 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:33 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then clearing. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 8:33 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
